title: My son can't put it down.
text:
[[VIDEOID:a436dc1c99880e627daa1160acfa8c4f]] My son has had many different yo-his and by far this is the easiest for him to do tricks with a learn new ones. Since he has had this one I haven't seen him without it. Quality of the Yo-yo is good. The egg lights work as they should. The bearing and string quality is good. The string is a little tedious to wind up but that is due to the nature of the Yo-yo. My son has found a way to deal with it.

Is the Yo-yo slightly over priced? Possibly, I have seen it cheaper but so far it has been a solid Yo-yo and my son has enjoyed it and learning new tricks. Considering, his enjoyment it would be worth it but it would be great to see the price comparable to others online providers.

title: Hours of fun!
text:
When I was a kid I always enjoyed these type of marble builds and this no different now for my kids and even me. This has been a favorite toy since opening. The instruction are good but can be a challenge for smaller children and likely will need help. However, once assembled it is hours of fun. You can always go crazy and make your own designs as well.

The blocks are durable and well made. They are a larger size which I like but I'm still very cognizant of anything head toward the mouth.

I had no issues while assembling. Overall, it's worth the its price and I have been happy with it.

title: Great camera for your little ones to capture their adventures.
text:
I was pleasantly surprised by this camera and how well it functions and the quality of the pictures and video. This is great for empowering little ones to capture moments from their perspective. The camera comes with everything you need to.

Overall quality of the camera is very good. Quality of the pictures and video is great for a child's cameras, still pictures are 16mp, and video is 1080P HD.

Overall, The camera is the perfect size for a toddler's hands with easy-to-use buttons. Operating it is intuitive and the brightly colored LCD screen is a plus.. The puzzle games are plus while traveling in the car. Even can function as a MP3 player which can be good and bad, given some of todays wonderful children's songs that turn into ear worms.

I'm have been more than pleased with this product and think it is a great buy.

title: Awesome build, my 12 year old loved!
text:
In my sons words “it was an awesome build”. He has done a number of builds from many brands. He said this was similar to all
Of them…the pieces, instructions were similar and just as challenging.

The product matched the description in the ad. It arrived nicely packaged, no issues with shipping. No pieces were missing and came with plenty of spares, see picture. The movement was smooth after a little of adjustments; note, if you have issues make sure the little red plus signs pegs are pressed all the way in. If they are not, then they will drag a but and make the movement rough, see close up picture.

I gave “easy to assembly” a 4 but is in no way a knock on the product. I would actually change that to level of challenge with 5 being the most difficult. The instruction were clear with minimal ambiguity.

It took my son roughly 6 hours to build the ~1000 piece model and he enjoyed every minute. He made one mistake while building but was able to catch it at a later step and easily fixed the issue.

I came back to by another one for my sister (which they are not available currently ... honestly another reason it lost a star) and there is a new picture of how the stand is used ... now I'm loving it!

title: Love them!
text: Fit perfect and they aren't see through, which is great because I have thunder thighs and a big ol booty - most regular leggings stretch too much, but these were perfect.

title: Good Quality
text: Bought this for my little battle buddy, came in on time (which was good because I ordered it a little late) with all the pieces expected. As per the norm when I buy him stuff, I didn't use the pants and had to do some hemming because I can never find anything for a doll his size, but it was a good quality and the lei was the perfect size. Loved it for the Jimmy Buffett concert we went to!

title: Five Stars
text: Great quality and made graduation day even more fun for me.
